articles.description: At the time of this writing, the growth-heavy Nasdaq Composite is down by more than 10% year to date -- underperforming the S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average -- both of which are also down, but by lesser degrees.  Daniel Foelber (Broadcom): Network connectivity and semiconductor giant Broadcom has given up all the gains it made after reporting its fiscal 2024 fourth-quarter results in December.
articles.snippet: The growth-heavy Nasdaq Composite is down by more than 10% year to date. The S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average are also down, but by lesser degrees. Broadcom has given up all the gains it made after reporting its fiscal 2024 fourth-quarter results in December.
